title: 92/158/EEC: Council Decision of 3 March 1992 authorizing the Kingdom of Spain to extend until 7 March 1993 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa
header:
COUNCIL DECISION  of 3 March 1992  authorizing the Kingdom of Spain to extend until 7 March 1993 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa  (92/158/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Kingdom of Spain is hereby authorized to extend until 7 March 1993 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa which entered into force on 8 March 1982.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 March 1992.
For the Council
The President
Arlindo MARQUES CUNHA
